Title: Flajaxian S3 Amazon Service Uploader
Description: Flajaxian S3 Amazon Service Uploader is adapter for the Flajaxian FileUploader .NET web control designed for asynchronous file upload to an Amazon Service of multiple files at the same time, without a page post back and with a progress bar indicating the current upload progress. This control and adapter do not require full trust environment.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Flajaxian S3 Amazon Service Uploader is adapter for the Flajaxian FileUploader .NET web control designed for asynchronous file upload to an Amazon Service of multiple files at the same time, without a page post back and with a progress bar indicating the current upload progress. This control and adapter do not require full trust environment.

Requires: http://www.codeplex.com/FlajaxianFileUpload (also free and open source)

Flajaxian S3 Amazon Service Uploader uploads the files using the local server as a proxy. As a result your bandwidth will be doubled and the upload time will take longer. If you want to have your files posted directly to the Amazon, use http://flajaxianss3direct.codeplex.com/ instead.

Web Site: http://www.Flajaxian.com
Wiki: http://flajaxian.com/flajaxian.com/docs/html/HowToUseAmazonUploader.htm
Docs: http://www.flajaxian.com/flajaxian.com/docs/com.flajaxian.AmazonUploader.chm.zip
Demo: http://www.flajaxian.com/flajaxian.com/docs/default.aspx#demo
